entry.string: The XML-RPC system API implements the reserved methods for a XML-RPC server. These methods are always named system.something and are assumed to be reserved names. This means that other apis cannot use the "system" prefix for their registered methods.
In Xaraya the xmlrpcserver module is responsible for providing the xmlrpc transport needed for this API functionality. This module will not function without the xmlrpcserver module activated.
You can find the specification for the system API at:
Further information on the Xmlrpcsystemapi module can be found at
Click on Version History tab at the bottom to get the latest release information.
Related tutorials and documentation on Xmlrpcsystemapi found at
